subject: Stadiums and Arenas
Football
organizations: Rutgers, The State University of New Jersey
lead_paragraph: Rutgers University approved spending $102 million to expand its football stadium by 14,000 seats. The plan approved by the university’s governing board will boost the stadium’s capacity to 56,000.The plan calls for borrowing $72 million that will be repaid through increased ticket revenues. Another $30 million is to come from private donations. The project is expected to be completed by 2009.
